website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Intent XT 2 received positive reviews from most consumers. Its versatility, solid support, and price earned the acclaim of most fitness enthusiasts. They also enjoyed its capacity to prevent accidental shoe removals and heel slippage. On the downside, there were also those who expressed their displeasure about the narrow fit, high arch support, and easily detached outsole.
pros: Many wearers found the Ryka Intent XT 2 to be comfortable for daily use
A majority of fitness aficionados complimented its construction
they noted that it was versatile enough to keep up with a diverse range of workouts
Numerous buyers were impressed with its quality materials and performance in comparison to its inexpensive price
The midsole offered robust support for weightlifting and other workouts, according to a myriad of reviews
Several users remarked that its secure and snug fit prevented accidental shoe removals and heel slippage
Some reviewers liked the shoe’s reliable arch support for those with high arches
A smattering of testers was pleased with the breathability of the upper unit
cons: The shoe was received many complaints about its uncomfortably narrow fit
A small number of wearers reported that the outsole separated from the trainer after only several months of use
A few purchasers griped about the shoe’s too high arch composition

customer_reviews.title: wonderful for the foot challenged
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit my wide orthotic. I wear them together every day. They grip my heel wonderfully unlike so many other shoes out their. These shoes have kept me walking. Couldn't function without them. Bonus is very reasonable price. I over pronate; have plantar fasciatis and limp. Finding the right shoes is always a nightmare so I am sticking to these like glue.
customer_reviews.author: L. Warshaw

customer_reviews.title: These have been Great. Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Read somewhere to get a Wide but didn't really need to. I am a Rural Carrier, Mail Carrier for anyone that doesn't know what that is. We stand for long periods at a time in the morning getting our mail and packages ready for delivery. Then we drive long distances and get out of the vehicle repetitively all day. Absolutely cannot slip or fall ever. Shoes are Number ONE priority. These have been Great. Supportive. non slip and great with my planters Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: mary E Stai

customer_reviews.title: Shoes made for the shape of a woman's foot.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. I have worn them for all day (which included 2 hours of tennis) and my feet were still in good shape and the shoes still were comfortable. I have a narrow foot with a wider box. Ryka shoes come in medium and wide widths only. I only purchase the shoes that lace up because I have to tighten the area behind my toe box and heel. These are just about the only brand of shoes I can wear comfortably and they last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for my nursing career.
customer_reviews.text: Perfection! I needed shoes for nursing school that are leather and that have good support as I have OA in my big toes and flat arches. I do have a medical grade arch support that needs to be worn and these shoes accommodate them! I am on my feet 8-12 hours and my feet are able to withstand those hours in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber V.

customer_reviews.title: Heel too narrow to put on :-(
customer_reviews.text: After much struggling and using thinnest socks possible, I was able to put the shoe (8W) on. I used to LIVE in Ryka sneakers. When they were made in the U.S. Now that they are imported, the heel is FAR too narrow. I know, Ryka's are meant to have a narrow heel, but not THIS narrow. The heel's outer structure is made out of some very hard material, such that it does not bend at all. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Conniec

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Comfortable footbed. Removable inner lining and orthotics fit well. I have a B width foot and a slightly narrow heal and these fit well. Not too boxy. Like the total black color. My 2nd pair and the first were very well. In fact they are still in great shape but bought a second just in case they discontinue.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all round
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of leather sneakers that can double as regular shoes with dark slacks. Nice rubber grip on bottoms to prevent slipping and plenty of room in the toe box as I order a wide width which is hard to find in the stores. Part of the reason I love Amazon. Plus, Ryka is made to fit a woman's foot. Good price compared to tv shopping channels. Delivered to my home--can't lose.
customer_reviews.author: njacacia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable non-slip shoes
customer_reviews.text: I work in a fast paced bakery on my feet 50+ hours a week, and these shoes have been a lifesaver. From day 1 they fit perfectly and didn't need that typical "break in" period most shoes I get need. I also have a custom orthotic insert that fit right inside the shoe on top of the existing insole. The non-slip grip is great, I can run to the ovens on a potentially slippery floor without issue. The only drawback is that the material seems flimsy...I haven't had them long, but they don't seem like they're going to last me more than 3 months. Will update my review if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Febonio

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. No slip. Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Not as bulky, or heavy as the other work shoes. I use shoes for work and cycle 30 miles a week. I like the shoes best when cycling because it remains sturdy and flat. Im on my feet up to 12 hours a day. And i must wear no slip shoes in the kitchen. Overall, I think it was a great buy. I would like to see them improve with a more flexable sole, for comfort as I move and walk a lot at work. And please, add a little feminine touch by adding some color.
customer_reviews.author: Me myself I

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for average foot.
customer_reviews.text: I have an average foot and wear a size 8. This runner shoe is very wide, so wide I will have to wear double thick socks. The construction is cheap. They do not seem to be made as well as in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Stripes

customer_reviews.title: Ryka comes through for me again!
customer_reviews.text: I inspect houses, which means walking and climbing stairs all day. I'm not actually allowed to wear sneakers, but I've gotten away with these so far. When worn under slacks they can pass as loafers if no one looks closely. I wear them approximately 13 hours a day, and they are awesome, just like my other Ryka shoes. They fit well, no heel rub, no break-in period. They give me steady footing in slippery areas. An all-around good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My feet love me for buying these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have a collapsed arch and can't find shoes that are comfortable. These are my favorite shoes now. Not only comfortable when I wear them, but afterwards I don't feel like I had walked at all! My feet fell great. Toe box is wide for my big old feet - but not like Frankenstein shoes. These shoes don't make my feet look huge like some "comfortable" shoes can. The fit true is true to size. I wear these with leggings to run around errands, or with workout clothes. Get compliments either way.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found shoes that are wide enough and fit great!!! I have a wide foot and love my RYKA's!!! this is my third pair and I will not buy any other tennis shoe! LOVE THEM! Comfortable and fit great right out of the box, I took them out and put them on then wore them for 2 days straight, no break in period at all!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Ryka
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased around 30 pairs of Ryka Shoes over my years of being a RN. Always loved them but these are definitely a drop in quality!! When I first put them on it felt as if something were missing. No insole!! I took insoles from another pair of shoes so they would fit and they are now okay but why should I have to do that??? Very disappointed in Ryka.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: For work not running
customer_reviews.text: Seems like decent work shoe. I was expecting more padding from a "trail running" shoe to be honest. The shoe is fairly stiff and I can't imagine why they stuck trail running in the name because this is no running shoe. Since I am in fact using it for work it's not a problem. It seems well constructed and looks nice. It is unfortunately not particularly comfortable but I guess after a week my feet have adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ryka sneakers Tight fight/run slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: They are hard to break in. They are not what you would call "comfortable". I feel they are very supportive though, I'm hoping as I break them in I'll like them more. I always wear a size 8 M. They may run small, I'm afraid an 8.5 will be too big. If I ever order another pair I'll try a 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Mareetee

customer_reviews.title: Must have, you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sneaker for me. Need the weight for stability, great leather, always comfortable from the first day. Do not need breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Halligan

customer_reviews.title: Godd shoe, good value
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this particular shoe for years for Jazzercise. The size does run small, so I've always bought a half size larger than normal. This shoe works very well, fits comfortably and if you work out for an hour or so 3 - 4 times a week, will definitely last for at least 3 months before they start losing support. My last pair lasted for six months.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Sent them back
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes but not these. The fit was "weird" and not like my other Rykas. They were stiff and made of inferior material.
customer_reviews.author: Science Teacher

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because this shoe is not like other Ryka's
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because this shoe is not like other Ryka's. It does have a comfortable wide vamp area, but not enough padding. I decided to keep this pair rather than return because they are okay for wearing at home inside and out. The right shoe heal area slips/ the left is ok. They just don't live up to the Ryka's I've had before. Therefore, I do not recommend this particular RYKA "Intent XT 2 SR Trail Running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SkyBlue10

customer_reviews.title: First time disappointed in Ryka, too wide
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 M, I love Ryka shoes because they always fit well and are comfortable, however this must have been labeled incorrectly, because the toe area is too wide , lots of extra room that I didn't need, makes me feel off balance like I'm walking with clown shoes on, didn't send back because I had them too long before I wore them. Other than that, they look nice, footbed is comfortable, they would be great for walking if they weren't too wide in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: GloMar

customer_reviews.title: I had Ryka a number of years ago, bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I had Ryka a number of years ago, bought them to use my orthotics in them. This pair, same size as I always wear/wore, once the insole is out and orthotic is in, they have significantly less room than the shoes I'd formerly worn. Couldn't wear them, I had to send them back, ordered a half size larger, keeping my fingers crossed. Update, ordered a half size larger and wide width, and now they fit. I have a relatively small foot, but huge shoes. But at least the orthotic AND my foot now fit in the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: bbs

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for Women
customer_reviews.text: Rykas are always up to a size small for me. I normally wear an 8, but purchased a 9. The insoles are not great either. I put in my own. The shoes themselves are fantastic! A Podiatrist told me to try them. No issues since and that was 15 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: c rosling

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits....
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised that the shoes fit perfectly. Always weary about buying shoes over the internet. The 7 1/2 is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable lightweight shoes which are ideal for work. I work in a restaurant and I am on my feet and the slip resistant soles work very well. I hope Ryka is not planning on discontinuing them any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and affordable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Opinion of a flat foot: I have not yet worn these for an extended period, but this shoe is awesome. They say to try shoes on at the end of the day which is what I did after receiving them. As soon as I put it on it felt great. The foot bed is so comfortable. I got the all black version. I have been looking for an all black athletic shoe FOREVER, I finally found one that doesn't look like a "work" shoe. I love the carbon-fiber look styling, it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: imokay!

customer_reviews.title: they're great. I needed white shoes for nursing school and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they're great. I needed white shoes for nursing school and they are comfortable for a few hours, then feel hard as a rock. Also, they took a few weeks to wear in, there was a crease above where my toes are that was really painful, but has since gone away. I'll be upgrading after school, but they work! Nothing fancy! Their website has a shoe size printout that helps with sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and did a few miles the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and as expected. Comfortable and did a few miles the first time I wore them with no problems. Pretty good traction on dirt, but still a little slick on the muddy surfaces. Overall really liked them and would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: JTess

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Shoes
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have always bought ryka 1 size above my day shoe size and I have needed them like that, but this time I ordered them just 1/2 size larger and I was surprised that they almost seem too large. Ryka is the only kind of sports shoe that I have ever been able to wear. Nike shoes come up too high on my ankle and never stop hurting. Ryka makes shoes for a woman's foot and there is no break-in time, at least for me. I've worn Ryka for over 20 years. I wish they made a tennis shoe because I wear my Rykas for tennis and aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Pair. I work in medical office, required to wear all leather shoes in case of spills and really find nursing shoes uncomfortable. I never knew I t was so hard to find a sneaker that wasn't neon and mesh or fabric. I have bad feet and I wear these all day without foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni66

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just started wearing these shoes for work. They feel like there is no padding. My feet hurt and my knee is starting to hurt now too. This isn't my first pair of Ryka, but, it definitely is my last!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Colden

customer_reviews.title: First disappointing Ryka's out of a dozen pairs.
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Ryka fan. The only shoes I buy for the gym and work are Ryka's. Well I tried these and they are not nearly as comfortable as the other Ryka's I've had. And after 6 weeks the bottom is falling off. I am extremely disappointed and it is too late to return. So basically I just flushed all the $ I paid down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Eddy

customer_reviews.title: RYKA ROCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I used to be able to purchase them at the local mall, but the store went out of business. It's been years since I've had a pair! I missed them and was extremely disappointed with other name brands. I LOVE MY RYKA SNEAKERS!!!!! So comfortable and fit perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Sole
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for work. They only lasted me 2 months ,the sole started coming off Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - 8W presents as B width
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three Ryka brand shoes due to reviews on how roomy the toe box was. I wear a 7-1/2 WW and ordered the 8W, which appeared to be a B width and were very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie O.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for their non-slip characteristic for which I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for their non-slip characteristic for which I would give them a high rating. I purchased them in an 8W, and they fit well in length and width. But as for the comfort factor, they are lacking. I couldn't wear them for very long at all with the factory inserts. There was just no support. After replacing the insoles, I can wear them for about 6 hours before I begin feeling fatigue in my arches. I am standing all day, so I need a lot of support, which unfortunately, these do not provide.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: RYKA Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing RYKA shoes for years. I have a wide foot and this brand is the only one I have found that I can buy, put on and wear with NO trouble. They fit to a T. Amazon is about the only place that carries a good selection in my size. Amazon is my go to place for not only RYKA shoes but other merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!! 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I hav ever owned, and used. I walk between 4 and 8 miles a day not to mention standing for hours at a time for work. These shoes help my feet and knees so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: They are a great value. The shoes are long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes are made by women for women. They are a great value. The shoes are long lasting . They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever bought. I have no complaints about the shoe except I wish there was more variations.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe just not for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit and was comfortable but I did not like the stiffness of the vinyl. The customer service with the return was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: KLark

customer_reviews.title: Good work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Basic black shoes. The material is a coated black plastic, good for work since it cleans easy. Not fashionable or breathable for out and about shoes or workout shoes.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: I usually love Ryka's and get a good comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Ryka's and get a good comfortable fit, however this shoe was stiff and nonflexible. It also was too wide at both heels causing slipping up and down. Sadly, I had to return these for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Intent XT Runnng Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are a little more narrow than my last pair of wide running shoes. They are more like Medium width but not too tight. With some break in time, I'm sure they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Allen

customer_reviews.title: Butt UGLY in person!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but these are butt ugly shoes! The leather looks like cheap plastic and the details are clumsy. Very disappointed but I'm her for outdoor chores... They did not impress me AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer, BUFFALO NY

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very nice looking style of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk and ordered this shoe without trying them locally first. It’s a very nice looking style of shoe. Although I ordered wide, they seemed a little narrow. They do offer extra wide, which may be worth the price. My orthotics did not fit as well with this style,but they are somewhat comfortable without them. They are reasonably priced and are worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: I can wear them for a normal day but extensive walking is not as comfortable as with the Radiant
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well but don't have the same heel structure as the Radiant. I ordered them because I wanted a pair of black shoes & assumed they would help my arthritic feet as well as the Radiant but they don't. I can wear them for a normal day but extensive walking is not as comfortable as with the Radiant. I'll keep them but they are not as therapeutic.
customer_reviews.author: Second time purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I could not wear this shoe it was too small and narrow. It was a very stiff shoe with no bending. I have this brand and like them but not this style. I'll be very careful buying this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Doris S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for black sneakers that don't scream TOURIST!
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of walking in Paris after I bought these. They are flat when you remove their thin insert. For me that's perfect since I have a lift and then use an arch support insert over it. While the style is somewhat big and bulky, they did their job and in a more subtle black. The soul is wider and very stable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Walz

customer_reviews.title: Fine Product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as I expected and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene S. Stepter

customer_reviews.title: The best running\ walking shoe for folks with bones spurs\ planters fascitists!
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is the best running shoe I've found. Had history of heal spurs. The heal on these has helped heal my foot. This is the 5 th pair I've bought. Will always buy Rykas for me. Comfort style and support. BTW no further heels spurs. Its the round indent that relieves the planters fascinates in my foot great shoe. Comes in narrow sizes
customer_reviews.author: Jay Erlinger

customer_reviews.title: ... sides of my foot near the ankle hurt so bad I thought I sprained my ankle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and the first day I wore them was a short shift so they were ok but the next day( normal 8 hour shift) the top and sides of my foot near the ankle hurt so bad I thought I sprained my ankle.I bought some of the silicone laces runners use and that helped. After only 3 months of wear the surface is peeling off.I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: noreen ulrich

customer_reviews.title: I love Ryka shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes! They look & feel great. I have custom orthotics & after inserting them under the removable foot pad, I have a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: shebbie

customer_reviews.title: They've held up GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these shoe's daily for over a year now. I'm a EMT-Paramedic and am actually really hard on my shoes... I usually try to replace shoes every 4-6 months, but these have held up so well that I'm just re-ordering now. This is the third style of RYKA I've purchased, and have loved each of them equally - I'll be a RYKA customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toebox
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. They only lay about a year before the sides blowout but they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Parma

customer_reviews.title: Love Ryka's - just wish they would make a model available for longer than 6 months at a time
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with my feet all my life and Ryka is the only brand that seems to work for me. That being said, not all types of Ryka's work. Some seem too shallow and some seem a bit tight. And my biggest problem is finding them in colors that are toned down enough that I can wear daily to my office. But this particular style fits very well, and finding a plain black is rare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I like Ryka shoes use to get another kind, but the company stopped making them. I find them Ryka are great and buy all kinds of their shoes. Size 5 is very hard to find, so when I see I get them.
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shoe hurts my feet and is not good for my work outs. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: Looked different than picture and fit different than other ryka. I love Ryka brand because it fits immediately. Feels like walking on air. This one was not that way.
customer_reviews.author: Deli

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have great toe space. This is my 2nd pair. Tried on many shoes then realized I needed to stick with the type shoe I had been wearing the past 3 years. Shoe holds up and wears well all day.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes... wore them as a police officer on bike...kept my feet dry while going through sprinklers or wet grass. Unfortunately I couldn't find them again on Amazon and had to buy Avia
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: these were great. They're comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first, these were great. They're comfortable, and my feet don't hurt after standing up for long periods of time. However, now that I've only worn the shoes for about 2 months, the left shoe is starting to separate along the seam near the top of my big toe. I've owned Ryka shoes before and been really happy with them, but I've been disappointed with the durability of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Curl_Up_With

customer_reviews.title: These fit just like the old pair
customer_reviews.text: I usually have trouble finding shoes that fit, but I'd had a pair of these before so I knew exactly what size to order. These fit just like the old pair. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ButI have been finding myself putting them on more and more for every day because they still feel great. I must admit that sever
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these shoes about 7 years ago and had regulated them to be worn when working in the yard because of the worn look. ButI have been finding myself putting them on more and more for every day because they still feel great. I must admit that several pairs of "walking shoes" have fallen apart since I bought my first pair of RYKA and the RYKA shoes still are going. Good shoes
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have the hardest time finding shoes that fit comfortable for more than 1 day. I can walk in these all day every day.
customer_reviews.author: LWebb

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for women.
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet these are the shoes for you. I always had to buy a size larger to accommodate my wide feet. Now I can buy a smaller size without a lot of extra toe space. These shoes are very comfortable. I wear them all day long 5 days a week. I have a pair in black because it doesn't show dirt. I also have a pair in white for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette P. Carter

customer_reviews.title: great shoe; great price!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews and as most suggested, ordered a size up from what I normally wear. I have found this to be true with all of my Ryka shoes. I work in a cold food prep area and wear winter boot socks with these shoes and my feet are warm and comfortable. No break in time....wore them for eight hours right away. As slip resistant as another major brand and much more comfortable! Love my Ryka shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits great. It is a very comfortable walking shoe especially if you are on your feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitting Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Ryka is my new favorite brand of shoes. They fit like a glove. I have a high arch and these have great support for it. This particular shoe also has something on the bottom to make it have good traction in winter climates, and it lives up to that.
customer_reviews.author: grp

customer_reviews.title: And has great arch
customer_reviews.text: my knee stopped hurting after I wore these only a day. And has great arch support
customer_reviews.author: jennifer lucas

customer_reviews.title: These will do just fine this fall.
customer_reviews.text: It is squeaky , but promises sure footedness and water repellent qualities , so that will be forgiven. The toe box may be a bit tighter than the summer weight shoes, but wearing them will tell. Comfy .
customer_reviews.author: Laika

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. Im As a postal worker you need good supportive slip resisitant shoes and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: moonshadow31301

customer_reviews.title: Great Nursing Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great nursing shoes! I am constantly on my feet & these have great traction & have been lasting a good length of time without any sign of wear & tear.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M.

customer_reviews.title: I have had several pairs of these and I love them. They do run short though
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these and I love them. They do run short though. These were comfortable right out of the box and I wear them to clean office buildings. I love that they are non-skid and DO NOT have mesh tops as most other shoes do, therefore they last longer and they are warmer in the winter. Nice wide toe and narrow heel, works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi-C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 pairs due to the fact the first pair completely came apart after 3 months of daily use. The sole came unglued from the upper. I do wear them 8 hours a day and walk about 4-6 miles at work. (Track with a Pedometer) The fit and comfort is excellent and I'm hoping the second pair holds up better than the first.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet most of the day at work. Uncomfortable when worn as is for the first week, until I adjusted the laces. Will be buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size but the back of the heel at the top hits pretty high up and rubs blisters on my ankles. Otherwise they are very comfortable. Hopefully they will break in.
customer_reviews.author: LEGOC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes, Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair or Ryka shoes. So comfortable for my high arches and narrow feet with AA heels. These do not hurt or slip off my heels. The sole is nice and thick so you don't feel the ground through the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Live4Him

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe for heel pain I've found.
customer_reviews.text: The only shoe (and I bought a NIKE air), that does not cause my achilles heel to hurt. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Martjill

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I'm a nurse and spend a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of this same shoe. Love them! I'm a nurse and spend a lot of time on my feet. I appreciate the good arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes They Are Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected great for running a perfect fit and stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not non-slip!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are NOT non-slip. Don't buy them for that feature. Love ryka shoes, but this was very disappointing. Now I have to buy different shoes for work :(
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Women's Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ryka athletic shoes are the most comfortable that I have tried. There's always lots of room, support, & function. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: RYKA is good for women's feet!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe if you are on your feet all day. This shoe keeps me moving, good support. Ryka compliments a women's foot perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: TexasSassy74

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So far, they seem fine. The outside edges of the soles seem a bit thick, so that's putting some pressure on the outside edge of the sole of the foot. Hoping that will soften up a bit so I can wear them longer. They don't hurt my bunions!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wolfenberg

customer_reviews.title: I can't run in this shoes because the heels are ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't run in this shoes because the heels are lopsided, dipped lower than the rest of the feet so they are difficult to run in. Maybe I got a defective pairs. I use it for walking
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy with great arch support. The arch support took a few hours to get used to, but it was worth it. No trouble with my plantar fasciitis when I wear these! Hoping they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Need another pair of white sneakers so I brought anger pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gadsden

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have high arches and these are the best for support on top of being skid resistant. So comfortable. These are the only shoes I wear for work on hard tiled floors.
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: I like these but am not in love
customer_reviews.text: I like these but am not in love. Someone mentioned tongue is short and that's probably the main drawback. Otherwise, they are solid but not heavy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Owner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. I walk 2 miles to work and on my feet all day☺️
customer_reviews.author: Theresa schwerbel

customer_reviews.title: Not up to RYKA standards
customer_reviews.text: I've worn RYKA shoes for some time and until now was always incredibly happy with them. This pair is much more stiff, lacks cushioning and is cut smaller than every other style I've had. They aren't horrible, but I wouldn't want to wear them all day long.
customer_reviews.author: jhr13

customer_reviews.title: these are the best shoes I have ever put my feet into
customer_reviews.text: these are the best shoes I have ever put my feet into! They support my heal and arch very well. As a groomer I am on my feet a lot and for long times these are the shoes to do it in my feet weren't even sore my first day with them
customer_reviews.author: Lori McClannahan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Ryka shoes for 10+ years including working 40 hrs/week on the floor at Home Depot. Best support and comfort and I can now out orthotics in them. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: CStudermazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price, fits well if you know how to measure your feet and get the right size. If you need wide shoes please don't be afraid to get wide, it makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Deva

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Ryka.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Fit well, comfy and look good on! Thank you Ryka for making a 10 1/2 for women. No more stuffinf my feet into a 10 or flopping around in an 11!
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: They felt great from the very first time I put them on
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Ryka. They felt great from the very first time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Size, comfort, and value as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these shoes for work, and they are as comfortable as advertised. She's very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great stability!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered these shoes. I'm recovering from a back injury and needed shoes that help with stability. These shoes give me that stability and feel very comfortable on. A great shoe at a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: Jute196

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I use them at work because I stand 8 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Asmnccbsx

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but my usual 6M was too tight in leather. Returned for another size.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki of CA

product_meta.title: RYKA Womens Intent XT 2 Slip Resistant-W Intent Xt 2 Slip Resistant-w
product_meta.description: An updated version of our classic intent xt. The intent st 2 is designed for a variety of training activities. For the woman seeking additional cushioning, extra support and exceptional comfort.
feature_bullets: Slip resistant rubber coverage for extra traction and durability
Compression molded eva with sgs midfoot shank for extra support.
